content.rendered:
✝️ Holy Water Strain – Feminized & Autoflowering Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

Divine Flavour. Balanced High. Heavenly Yields.

The Holy Water strain is a flavour-forward sativa-dominant hybrid crafted from the sacred pairing of Holy Grail Kush x Watermelon. Available in both feminized photoperiod and autoflowering formats, Holy Water blends the uplifting qualities of sativa with the grounding calm of indica—delivering an experience that’s refreshing, relaxing, and radiantly euphoric.

With clean, crisp flavours, THC levels around 21%, and a flowering time of just 8–9 weeks, Holy Water is a dream for collectors seeking stand-out genetics and premium performance.

Please Note: These feminized and autoflowering cannabis seeds are sold strictly as adult souvenirs. Germination or cultivation of cannabis seeds is illegal in the UK without a government-issued license.

📊 Holy Water Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Holy Grail Kush x Watermelon
Strain Type Sativa-Dominant Hybrid
Flowering Time 8–10 Weeks (Photoperiod) / 8-9 Weeks (Auto)
Outdoor Height Up to 90 inches
Outdoor Yield 15–20 oz/plant (approx. 425–550g)
THC Content 21%
Flavours Watermelon, earthy Kush, citrus finish
Aromas Fresh, fruity, clean, slightly herbal
Effects Happy, relaxed, uplifting, stress relief

🌟 Why Holy Water Strain Stands Out

  • Dual Format: Available in both feminized and autoflowering varieties.
  • Clean Flavour: Sweet watermelon, earthy Kush, and citrus in one smooth inhale.
  • Reliable Potency: 21% THC offers a blissful, balanced experience for any time of day.
  • High Yields: Generous outdoor output with manageable growth indoors or out.
  • Mood Magic: Elevates your mindset while calming the body—ideal for stress relief.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions About Holy Water Strain

1. What is the Holy Water strain?
Holy Water is a sativa-dominant hybrid from Tastebudz Syndicate, bred from Holy Grail Kush and Watermelon. It’s known for its refreshing flavour, balanced effects, and versatile growth.

2. Is Holy Water available as an autoflower?
Yes! Holy Water is available in both photoperiod feminized and autoflowering formats, offering flexibility for all types of collectors and setups.

3. What does the Holy Water strain taste like?
Expect sweet watermelon on the inhale, earthy Kush on the exhale, and a clean citrus finish that keeps each hit refreshing and smooth.

4. How strong is the Holy Water strain?
With a THC level around 21%, Holy Water delivers a pleasant and manageable high—great for both seasoned enthusiasts and those seeking something smooth but effective.

5. What are the effects of Holy Water strain?
Holy Water produces an uplifting, happy high with relaxing undertones. It’s often chosen by collectors looking for mood enhancement, tension relief, and creative energy.

🛒 Add Holy Water to Your Collection Today

Whether you prefer feminized or autoflowering varieties, the Holy Water strain delivers divine flavour, balanced effects, and generous yields. A true hybrid blessing with heavenly potential.

🔗 Also Available From Our Official Retailers

Looking for Holy Water strain from a trusted source near you? This strain is also available through our network of verified retailers.

excerpt.rendered:
A divine creation, Holy Water is a sativa-dominant hybrid born from the legendary Holy Grail Kush and juicy Watermelon. With 21% THC, it delivers a refreshing flavour of sweet watermelon, earthy Kush, and a crisp citrus finish. Ready in just 8-9 weeks, this strain offers generous yields and effects that bring happiness, relaxation, and gentle stress relief. Holy Water is perfect for cultivators and connoisseurs seeking quality, potency, and satisfaction.

Feature Details
🌱 Type Sativa-dominant hybrid
🔬 Genetics Holy Grail Kush x Watermelon
🔥 THC 21%
💡 Indoor Yield Up to 550g/m² (approximate)
🌳 Outdoor Yield Up to 15-20 ounces (approx. 425-567g) per plant
⏳ Flowering 8-9 weeks
🍉 Flavours Sweet, juicy watermelon, smooth earthy Kush, with a crisp citrus finish
✨ Effects Happiness, relaxation, gentle stress relief
